nodes.text: The Draflago were a sentient species from the Draflago system that was active in the galaxy in the early years of the Galactic Empire. The Tion Hegemony's sole university, the University of Rudrig, had a number of luxury mud tanks available for visiting Draflago.
The Draflago were first mentioned in Han Solo and the Lost Legacy, a Brian Daley novel published by Del Rey in 1980. This throw-away mention revealed little about the species.
